about_the_game:
DLC includes:
- 3 new soundtracks
- New mechanics (collectible)
- Unique metal parts at each stage (4-14)
- Sound and visual effects
- Hint about future project

If you have already completed more than 14 Stages, then you will be able to collect all the details at once and find out the secret first!
Collect the whole Mysterious Sphere and find out what is hidden inside!
detailed_description:
DLC includes:
- 3 new soundtracks
- New mechanics (collectible)
- Unique metal parts at each stage (4-14)
- Sound and visual effects
- Hint about future project

If you have already completed more than 14 Stages, then you will be able to collect all the details at once and find out the secret first!
Collect the whole Mysterious Sphere and find out what is hidden inside!
name: Catellite-609: feline space adventure  — Mysterious Sphere

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Catellite-609: feline space adventure  — Mysterious Sphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space

short_description: After several successful surveys, the team noticed strange glowing metal parts overboard. Collecting them can get something? What will come of it? Find out first!
